sf173:2: uktam idaṁ śāriputra mayā parāyaṇeṣv ajitapraśneṣu |
sf173:3: ye ca saṅkhyātadharmāṇi ye ca śaikṣāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ | teṣāṁ me nipakasyeryāṁ pṛṣṭaḥ prabrūhi māriṣa || ||
sf173:4: ke śāriputra śaikṣāḥ ke ca saṅkhyātadharmāṇi |
sf173:6: dvir api trir api bhagavān āyuṣmantaṁ śāriputram idam avocat |
sf173:7: uktam idaṁ śāriputra mayā parāyaṇesv ajitapraśneṣu |
sf173:9: dvir api trir apy āyuṣmāñ chāriputras tūṣṇīm abhūt |
sf173:12: evam etad bhūtaṁ bhadanta | bhūtasya bhadanta bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno bhavati |
sf173:13: tadāhārasaṁbhavaḥ | tadāhārasaṁbhavasya bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno bhavati |
sf173:14: tadāhāranirodha iti | yad bhūtaṁ tan nirodhadharmam iti viditvā nirodhadharmasya bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno bhavati |
sf173:17: evam etad bhūtaṁ bhadanta | bhūtasya bhadanta bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāyānupādāyāsravebhyaḥ samyaksuvimuktacitto bhavati |
sf173:18: tadāhārasaṁbhavaḥ | tadāhārasaṁbhavasya bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāyānupādāyāsravebhyaḥ samyaksuvimuktacitto bhavati |
sf173:19: tadāhāranirodha iti | yad bhūtaṁ tan nirodhadharmam iti viditvā nirodhadharmasya bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāyānupādāyāsravebhyaḥ samyaksuvimuktacitto bhavati |
sf173:21: evam etac cchāriputra bhūtam | evam etac cchāriputra bhūtasya bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya pūrvavad yāvat saṅkhyātadharmāṇaḥ |
sf173:22: atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād vihāraṁ prāviśat pratisaṁlayanāya |
sf173:23: athāyuṣmāñ chāriputro ’ciraprakrāntaṁ bhagavantaṁ viditvā bhikṣūn āmantrayati |
sf173:24: apratisaṁviditaṁ mām āyuṣmanto bhagavān etaṁ prathamaṁ praśnaṁ pṛṣṭavān | tasya me ’bhūd apūrvaṁ dhandhāyitatvam |
sf173:25: yataś ca me bhagavāṁs tat prathamaṁ praśnavyākaraṇam abhyanumoditavān tasya me etad abhavat |
sf173:26: sacet kevalikāṁ rātriṁ bhagavān etam evārtham anyaiḥ padair anyair vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṁ pṛcchet kevalikām apy ahaṁ rātriṁ bhagavata etam evārtham anyaiḥ padair anyair vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṁ pṛṣṭo vyākuryām |
sf173:27: saced ekam divasam | ekaṁ rātridivasam | saptāpi rātridivasāni bhagavān mām etam evārtham anyaiḥ padair anyair vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṁ pṛcchet | saptāpy ahaṁ rātridivasāni bhagavata etam evārtham anyaiḥ padair anyair vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṁ pṛṣṭo vyākuryām |
sf173:28: athānyataro bhikṣur yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma | upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthāt | ekāntasthitaḥ sa bhikṣur bhagavantam idam avocat |
sf173:29: āyuṣmatā bhadanta śāriputreṇa udārārṣahī vāg bhāṣitaikāṁśa udgṛhītaḥ pariṣadi samyaksiṁhanādo nāditaḥ |
sf173:30: apratisaṁviditaṁ mām āyuṣmanto bhagavān etaṁ pūrvavat |
sf173:31: sacet kevalikām apy ahaṁ rātrim āyuṣmantaṁ śāriputram etam evārtham anyaiḥ padair anyair vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṁ pṛccheyaṁ yāvat saptāpi rātridivasāni śāriputra etam evārtham anyaiḥ padair anyair vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṁ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt |
sf173:32: tathā hi śāriputrasya bhikṣor dharmadhātuḥ supratividdhaḥ |
